plot: The province of Corrientes, nap time. A humble shack in the middle of the forest, a love song, childhood games, a river. The world outside filters through, changes the meaning of it all.
title: Bajo el cielo azul
plot_es: The province of Corrientes, nap time. A humble shack in the middle of the forest, a love song, childhood games, a river. The world outside filters through, changes the meaning of it all.
